Package com.adminportal.repository

Interface TestimonialRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Testimonial,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Testimonial,​java.lang.Integer>
    public interface TestimonialRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Testimonial,​java.lang.Integer>
    This Interface Extend CrudRepository to handle all database operation related to Testimonial data
    Author:
    om prakash

    • Method Detail

      • getAllTestimonial

        @Query("from Testimonial t order by t.dateAdded desc")
java.util.List<Testimonial> getAllTestimonial()
        Find all testimonial record from database in descending order based in date on which testimonial added
        Returns:
        A list of testimonial

      • updateTestimonial

        @Modifying
@Query("update Testimonial set name=?1,description=?2,organization=?3 where testimonialId=?4")
int updateTestimonial​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String desc,
                      java.lang.String org,
                      int id)
        Update testimionial data given Testimonial ID as one of input parameter
        Parameters:
        name - name of person to be updated
        desc - description to be updated
        org - organization name to be updated
        id - testimonial ID
        Returns:
        number of record updated

@Transactional
void deleteTestimonial​(int testiID)
